title: Effective Humor Utilization Strategies in Pharmacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended online-offline environment utilizing learners' personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more appropriate humor types in lecture-based instruction
Learners can apply humor insertion techniques 1-2 times per hour-long lecture to real-world cases
Learners can explain the impact of humor on improving the learning environment (e.g., engagement, concentration) with specific examples.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
